about_the_game:
The original romantic orchestral songs from the visual novel "Daring Academy", used in its chapter 1 demo. Includes 24 songs and over an hour of music, including songs from Saddle Studios, Thediamondcrystal, JustLetterH, Amelia Sweet, and others.

The original Chapter 1 Demo soundtrack includes both MP3 and FLAC files.

All proceeds of this will go to the development of the full game and any future games by Thediamondcrystal. Thank you for your support.
